name: Postman Generator Attributes
description: Specification contains various ApiBuilder attributes, which are recognized by Postman Collection Generator

fields.name: username
fields.description: Specifies the username to be used in Postman Collection auth definition. It may be also a variable reference.

fields.name: password
fields.description: Specified the password to be used in Postman Collection auth definition. It may be also a variable reference. Leave this string empty, when only a username is needed.

fields.name: related_service_namespace
fields.description: ApiBuilder service's namespace, in which a target operation is specified.

fields.name: resource_type
fields.description: Resource type, that holds a referenced operation.

fields.name: identifier_field
fields.description: A field name. When the referenced operation is called, identifier_field is used to extract the corresponding field from the response JSON.

fields.name: related_service_namespace

fields.name: resource_type
fields.description: Resource type, that holds a referenced operation.

fields.name: identifier_field
